SENSES.SENSE: the team in baseball, softball , etc. that is throwing the ball and trying to catch it when the other team hits it
an area that a person or piece of equipment can see at one time
all the people or animals taking part in a race or competition<font color=blue> ex: Henderson will be competing against a very strong field today. </font>
a part of a database that contains information of a particular type<font color=blue> ex: Type your name in the User field. </font>
an area where a particular force has an effect<font color=blue> ex: a magnetic field </font>
a subject that you study, or a type of work that you do<font color=blue> ex: Professor Edwards is one of the main experts in his field. </font>
an area of land used for keeping animals or growing food<font color=blue> ex: The crowd gave Ripken a standing ovation when he took the field. </font>
